text:
[Verse]
Morning light starts the day
Dreams still floating by
Magic's in the whispered breeze
Reaching for the sky

[Verse 2]
Colors dance all around
Sparkling in the sun
Feel the rhythm in my feet
Hearts beating as one

[Chorus]
Magic in the air tonight
Stars are shining bright
Feel the wonder everywhere
Everything's just right

[Verse 3]
City lights guiding me
As I chase the beat
Music’s calling out my name
Life feels so sweet

[Chorus]
Magic in the air tonight
Stars are shining bright
Feel the wonder everywhere
Everything's just right

[Bridge]
Whispers in the moonlight
Echo through the night
Hold on to this feeling
Everything's just right
title: Magic in the Air
